The Qurâ€™anic researcher, your Lord, said Mennar ibn Said: It is meaning: His grace appeared to the creation here, and that is not with the coming of a transmission, and so is the coming of the good.It was said: Speech on the addition of the added to Tahil, That is, the command of your Lord and his judiciary came to his grace, and the choice of a group is that it is a representative of the appearance of the verses of the consequences of the exalted His condition was represented in this way in the case of the king, if he attends himself, he appeared to his presence from the effects of the hippo With the abundance of their father, and you know what is the same in the similar one of the words and the king, meaning: the sweetener Surveys or with a description, as it was said: The day of the resurrection is the angels of every sky, and they are selected after a row after a description of the right of their homes They are defined by heaven and humanity, and it was said: They are selected according to the possibility of things that are attached to them while he is close to what was mentioned.It was narrated that the angels of every sky will be a row around the earth.Some of the virtues said: The back is that the king is a blessings of the heavens and others, and its definition of obstruction, and I claim that their drought is according to the paths Prayer, and its appearance is that it is a drought without being totally, and I have seen without a effect that they are selected.
